body:
Comment 14: 
6g needs to use less memory in general, and maybe some performance work in Go 1.3 will
address this.

We can't fix the specific problem you have reported without more information about what
triggers the specific problem (ideally an example input). If you can cut the input file
down to something that can be shared, please open a new issue. Suggested ways to do
that, checking whether the memory usage remains high as you do:

1. delete comments
2. delete function bodies
3. delete functions not referenced
4. delete global variables
5. rename things, replace string constants, etc to remove sensitive data
_Status changed to **Invalid**._
